title: Blended Learning Model Design and Application for Strengthening Practical Mathematics Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level basic mathematics knowledge and experience applying mathematics to job-related tasks
context.additional_context: Requires blended learning design combining offline classes with online collaborative activities in a smartphone-based, limited-technology environment, focusing on strengthening practical math problem-solving competencies.

learning_goals: Students can apply mathematical modeling techniques in blended learning environments with over 80% accuracy to solve practical problems.
Students complete over 90% of complex math problems through online collaboration with peer practitioners.
Students improve their ability to apply learning content to real-world work scenarios by over 75% through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
